posts.post_content:
Forgot I still have this card.  Price reduced 3 years later...

Price is $250 or best offer.  How can you put a price on such a rare and unique card?  This is your chance to be the care taker of the infamous "sh*tty Nodgrass", a card that was once owned by some kid with a pencil as well as once resided in the back pocket of some guy.  Don't let this chance slip by.  Price includes a brown paper bag to put over your head in case you feel the need to look at the card while sober. :)

[IMG]http://i187.photobucket.com/albums/x16/sylbry/Mobile%20Uploads/20160113_184303-1_zpszwqhlhg6.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i187.photobucket.com/albums/x16/sylbry/Mobile%20Uploads/20160113_184314-1_zps4ryflf6m.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i187.photobucket.com/albums/x16/sylbry/Mobile%20Uploads/20160113_184248-1_zpsxqqaai8j.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i187.photobucket.com/albums/x16/sylbry/Mobile%20Uploads/Screenshot_2016-01-13-18-49-27_zpsnlwaryil.png[/IMG]

Damn. I'm building a set of "Nodgrass's" with the capital "R" written in pencil on it. 

In all seriousness, your description is worth a bump.
You really should move this to the T206 section.
Only a mod can move a thread so if anyone ever makes a mistake just PM one of us....moved this one....thanks

Bump for price reduction as well as opportunity for others to insert a joke or two.  

Finish this sentence, "Your card is so ugly_________
Your -NODGRASS is so ugly the only way to improve on it would be if the DGR were missing too!

you thought it was your momma.
